ROW.NAME: 零星医疗费报账支出明细表

ROW.DATDSC: select rownum xh,pf_get_xm(1,zy) xm, decode( kmbh , '1013004' , decode( jefx,'借',nvl(-je, 0),nvl(je, 0) ),nvl(je, 0) ) je from cw_rjzb where (instrb(zy, '医疗费报销款') > 0 or instrb(zy, '个人退款') > 0 ) and ( ORG = '[%SYS_ORGID]' ) and ( ACC = '[%SYS_ACCID]' ) and ( (trim(to_char(YY,'0000'))||'-'||trim(to_char(MM,'00'))||'-'||trim(to_char(DD,'00'))) >= '[%DAT1]' ) and ( (trim(to_char(YY,'0000'))||'-'||trim(to_char(MM,'00'))||'-'||trim(to_char(DD,'00')))<= '[%DAT2]' ) and ( KMBH like '[%KMBH][%JQPP]' ) and lxbh like '[%RJLX]%'
